string.value: VAGRANT| What does it happen here?!
MECHANIC| Thank you for your help friend!
VAGRANT| No problem. I have recentrly been saving someone from this crazy scrap.
MECHANIC| This place used to be rather calm until these things appeared.
VAGRANT| And how long have they been here?
MECHANIC| Oh no. Not much. But they appeared suddenly and there were so many of them that few of us survived.
VAGRANT| Listen, fellow, don't you happen to know where their main base is?
MECHANIC| Of course! But we would be better of leave this place unless new iron monsters come. Help me get home and we discuss your idea there.
VAGRANT| Show me the way.
VAGRANT| Well, what's your idea?
MECHANIC| Judging by what I saw on the road, you are a good driver, an excellent shooter and a descent brave man.
VAGRANT| Well yes. Why?
MECHANIC| I have got a plan how to destroy all the robots. But we need a man like you to put it into action.
VAGRANT| Well? And what is your brilliant plan?
MECHANIC| We must get into the base where the robots are made and stop their manufacture.
VAGRANT| Great idea! And I dare say, it is fresh and original. And don't you happen to know any secret path leading to their base, do you?
MECHANIC| But this is not important. Not long ago I managed to get hold of a body of a robot; I repaired and modernized it a bit. Now, a man can get inside the robot and control it.
VAGRANT| Why go through so much trouble? My truck is much more maneuverable, and it is armed well.
MECHANIC| Sure, but you will have to fight your way to the robot base. I suggest that you get inside the base as one of them and destroy it from the inside. Looks like it should be any risk at all!
VAGRANT| And why have you not done this yet?
MECHANIC| I still need several parts to finish my job. And anyway, I am not as brave as you are.
VAGRANT| OK. Tell me what parts we need obtain. And then we will talk how to penetrate into the robots' base.

MECHANIC| You need to find a set of hoses for the hydraulic system, a battery and a couple of cameras for the optical system. You can get all of it from the repair robots that flooded Stagnum. I will mark the place on your map.
VAGRANT| Cool.
MECHANIC| Great! Now you can penetrate to the robots' base without any problem and destroy it from inside.
VAGRANT| I will think out how to penetrate, but there is another question, how shall we destroy it. Do you have any ideas where and how do it?
MECHANIC| Try to find the generator that supplies the factory with power. If you can destroy it, the hole manufacturing process will stop.
VAGRANT| Not a bad idea. I will try it.
VAGRANT| I see, it is not so easy to get in here as I thought. I must imitate the actions of the metal freaks. One wrong motion, and my robot will be retired to scrap. Together with me.
VAGRANT| It seems like this is the generator that the Mechanic told me about. Well, in a minute, the world will lose another generator.
EMISSARY| Who are you?!
VAGRANT| The one who spoiled all your kitchen. Why do you need the details?!
EMISSARY| How dare you?! You destroyed everything that I'd built for so long!
VAGRANT| Do not exaggerate. It's not all gone. You still got your vehicle and yourself.
EMISSARY| I'll grind you into dust nonentity!
VAGRANT| You've frightened me. You may think that I have started to fire because I'm afraid.
VAGRANT| It looks like some archive records. I'll try and turn them on ... It's done.

EMISSARY| Excerpt from the archive: ''This is on an continent, in the vicinity of the town of Rozwell, where an unknown flying object landed in 1974. The site was immediately cordoned off by the army and nobody could ever see the alien from ...

EMISSARY| Emissary to Oracle. Report No. 11. My mission in respect to search for the second flying apparatus Niery encountered unexpected opposition from part of local inhabitants. All my questions met mockery and misunderstanding.

EMISSARY| Due to impossibility to waste time in such useless manner I believe that we can proceed to the 'Stroke' tactic scheme. At the moment of this message, I took the control over a significant area. The UFO is not found.

EMISSARY| Emissary to Oracle. Report No. 15. In the course of operation on reconnaissance and cleaning out the area I captured a local inhabitant who agreed to cooperate. I believe this will give me some significant advantage in the search.
SAM| Listen, I seem to know you. You are the man who inquired everyone after Hangar 18, right?
EMISSARY| Yes, this is true. I had never received assistance in my search.
SAM| If I knew there is such a force behind you, sir, I would have treated you absolutely different. But it is not late to start now.
EMISSARY| Not late? For what?
SAM| Have you found Hangar 18 yet?
EMISSARY| No. Do you know its location?

SAM| Something like that. I know the territories adjacent to lands by my stronghold. I know where to search, but in order to manage the search we'll need forces that I do not have. By the way, I have lost control over my lands because of your robots too.
EMISSARY| What kind of information about the object are you interested in, do you want?
SAM| You have powerful machines and a terrible weapon at your command, sir. Share this all with me, and I will not only find your hangar for you but help clean out the area around it.
EMISSARY| I must think it over... OK, you will get what you want.

SAM| Great decision, sir. And another thing to warn you about. There is fellow hanging around here, his name is Vagrant. He is one of the most serious fighters that I know. Get rid of him when occasion serves.
EMISSARY| OK. I will remember that.

EMISSARY| I do not trust this man, but he is thirsty for power and as he gets the weapon and machine he will start to destroy the enemy where my robots have not reached yet. Therefore, he will complete the job I need.
VAGRANT| Well Sam! Well vermin! Crack your tank! I'll find you even at the end of the world!
VAGRANT| Now the ferry must start working! Well Sam! Wait!
Do you want to leave this area?
Mechanic is dead.
